remarks: Distribution of class substitution over union of two classes. (Contributed by Drahflow, 23-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)  Obsolete as of 13-Sep-2018.  Use ~ csbun instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
csbungOLD $p |- ( A e. _V -> [_ A / x ]_ ( C u. D ) = ( [_ A / x ]_ C u. [_ A / x ]_ D ) ) $.
$d A x $.
